hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
git clone https://github.com/pavel-mikhalchuk/kuberjenkins.git .
cp /var/jenkins_home/* ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/jobs ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/logs ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/nodes ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/plugins ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/secrets ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/updates ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/userContent ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/users ./ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/workflow-libs ./
git config user.email "jenkins@kube.com" git config user.name "Jenkins"
git add * git commit -m "Jenkins update ${BUILD-NUMBER}" git push
